main.name: Parsa Beheshti
main.description: I am interested in hardware design, power electronics, cars, and sustainability
main.bio: I am the son of first generation immigrants who moved to Canada in 2008. I have been fascinated with technology as far back as I could remember, and enjoy applying myself in creative ways to address problems of any size. I believe that we are at a point in time where all necessary technologies to drive a green transformation and overhaul of our society are available to us. Particularly, I want to put my focus on electrification of our transporation systems and making our energy systems more sustainable.
main.contactmessage: Interested in getting in touch? Feel free to fill out the form below!

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering and Management, Electrical
education.description: Combined 5-year program integrating electrical engineering and management principles through courses offered by the Faculty of Commerce.

work.title: Electrical Engineering Co-op
work.description: Functioning as a junior designer on the New Product Introduction team, I was responsible for supporting various projects' acitivities. Please refer to the resume above for further details.

extracurriculars.title: Battery Pack Engineering Co-Lead
extracurriculars.description: Working with the mechanical co-lead and Electrical Team Captain, I am responsible for overseeing the development of PCBA designs according to design requirements as well as manufacturing and assembly of electrical components within the high-voltage battery pack. Please refer to the resume above for further details.
